LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.label: Battle Friend
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.description: Designed to be a light infantry fighting unit, the Battle Friend model has a considerable load capacity and ability to use most of available human equipments, which isn't a surpise that it has served in mass numbers by forces that have the capacity to do so and deployed in various environments as it can equip heavy weapons with a considerable amount of ammo found in common logistics networks it is fighting in.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_BattleFrame.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.label: Escort Lifter
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.description: An early stage mass-production automatroid considered obsolete, there are still a lot of these units now modified for transportation purposes.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_EscortLifter.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.label: Field Command
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.description: A Battle Friend sub-variant model. It serves as a mobile mechanitor command relay, but due to its weight with its reduced fire control system and additional specialised relay systems, it can only equip a light weapon for self defense.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_FieldCommand.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.label: Shaft Worker
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.description: An early stage mass-production automatroid considered obsolete, there are still a lot of units in considerable numbers that have been modified for mining and construction purposes.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_ShaftWorker.tools.head.label: head
